pullrequest.title: Have wait monitor pulses not exceed acquisition device's capabilities

content.raw: This is also to help with the generic DAQmx support, as some DAQmx devices have counters with low resolutions and cannot resolve short pulses in experiments many seconds long. I'd be happy if DAQmx just said "the pulse was zero length at this resolution", but it doesn't, it gives an error (but not 100% of the time, so you can't catch the error and treat it as a zero length pulse). So we need to make pulses that are not too short - several microseconds on the NI PCI 6733 for example, much longer than the 100ns minimum we have hard-coded for the counter input task on the  NI PCIe 6363.
